summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PathFinder psychometric assessment MVP. All backend APIs and frontend features working correctly with no critical issues found.
passed_tests: Assessment submission with algorithm-based career matching
Results retrieval by ID with MongoDB persistence
Landing page loads with hero section and feature cards
Navigation between Home and Assessment pages
Assessment flow: 4 pages with 5 questions each
Likert scale interactions for all 20 questions
Validation prevents proceeding without answering questions
Previous/Next navigation with proper state management
Assessment submission and navigation to results
Results page displays top career match with percentage
Results page shows personality type and top strengths
Direct results access validation (shows 'No results found')
Navigation component works across all pages
